body.name: Busy Board for Toddlers - Montessori Toys Sensory Activity Board for Fine Motor Skills, Airplane Car Travel Essentials for Kids Boys Girls (Blue)

features: 28 in 1 Learning Activities Busy Board - The toddler activities busy board features dressing skills, fine motor skills and alphabet, colors, shapes, numbers 1-10. Preschool learning activities for hours of quiet play

Unique Design Montessori Toys - Compared with other busy book, svance montessori sensory toys add special design tangram puzzle, doodle board with 2 pens, transportation and animal pattern that are attractive for kids

Learn Through Play - Great toddler learning toys for early learners. The sensory toys is made of soft and safe felted wool and the double sided velcro already attached on to avoid falling off easily. Kindly reminder: Please immediately tie two knots on both ends of the rope once receiving the sensory busy board

Great Travel Essentials Toys - Easy handling weighing just 1 pound. Easily to carry it on the go. Perfect for car activities or airplane rides, restaurant time that will keep your kids busy on long journey

Ideal Educational Gifts - As screen-free alternative idea, great gift choice for children as Birthday, Carnival Prize, Christmas, Halloween, Thanksgiving. Perfect for kindergarten, homeschool. Well as learning materials for autism kids

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Surprise your kids with Svance busy board 28 Montessori toddler activities to learn including ABC, numbers, shapes, colors, self-dressing, tie shoes and develop kids fine motor skillsThanks to the attractive transportation and animal elements design with bright colors, your kid will be focused and entertainedDreaming travel toys that can be carried to anywhere such as airplane , car ride due to perfect size and handbag designPerfect gift choice for 1-6 years old toddlers as Birthday, Carnival Prize, Christmas, Halloween, Thanksgiving, Contest prizes

28-IN-1 Montessori Toys The busy board enables toddlers to self-learn dressing skills, zippers, shoelaces, buttons, belt buckles while playing, gaining joy and confidence. Preschool Learning Activities The sensory toy and preschool learning activity for toddlers includes 26pcs Alphabet , 10pcs Numbers, 10pcs Colors, 12pcs Shapes for kids to learn through play. Original Upgrade Design from Svance Upgraded designed with more sections with tangram puzzle and doodle board function. Mess free doodle toys for kids.
Learn through play Definitely good travel toys for toddlers Enjoy kids and parent's own time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So entertaining but lots of Velcro pieces - easy to lose.
reviews.reviewText: We love this busy book! Lots of the pieces are Velcro though. Easy to lose. But daughter N loves playing with!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice activity board for travel
reviews.reviewText: Bought four of these boards for my grandchildren. They love them, they are great for travel on the plane and car. They do have some small pieces so for the younger children, so they do need to be supervised. I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect learning material for young kids, my daughter loves it and is learning how to do alot with this book. highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for dinner with toddlers
reviews.reviewText: I’m always looking for ways to keep my toddler entertained when we go out to dinner with friends and family. This busy book is great! I initially took out (unzipped - great feature!) some of the “pages” because me son was a little too small and I didn’t want to lose all the Velcro pieces. We’ve slowly added back in “pages” and it’s almost transformed the book to a new book and grown with him. Love this book!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a birthday present for my daughter to learn & she loves to play with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for trips or everyday!
reviews.reviewText: Great busy tool for little ones and provides a fun sense of education. Tons of entertainment time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my daughter to keep her entertained on the plane and it is GREAT. It does not make a big mess and is easy to use. When you're ready to go, you can quickly zip it up and put it away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great gift for my on the go niece!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this gift for my niece’s 2nd birthday. It’s the perfect size for a toddler and has handles for easy carrying. It’s filled with different activities that she will grow with. She does a lot of traveling with her family and it’s perfect for traveling in the car, on an airplane or in a stroller, or in a restaurant! It’s made of fabric making it even easier to take along anywhere.
